To change perception about local beer, it‚Äôs essential to delve deep into the local history regarding beer and the stories behind breweries like Little Miami. This blog post shows how Little Miami Brewing Company has grown from a small company into a local institution. We‚Äôll trace the key moments, innovations, and unique beers that defined its legacy. Origins of Little Miami Brewing Company It began with a shared dream among friends who cherished exceptional beer. Founded in 2015 by Dan Lynch and Joe Brenner, Little Miami Brewing Company emerged as their vision of a place where quality beer and community spirit could converge. And this vision was very clear: brewing exceptional craft beers while hosting with warmth whoever comes to visit their city. The founders were inspired by the natural beauty and rich history of the Little Miami River, which led to the name of the brewery and continued to be a source of inspiration. The first location, right in the heart of Milford, was chosen for its historic value and beauty. This location not only gave an ideal backdrop for a brewery, but it also represented the past coming to life again in the present, deepening the threads of the Little Miami Brewing Company story. Early Days of Brewing We knew we had the brewing of beer nailed because joe was a friend of Jim Strelau, a 30 year veteran of the Cincinnati Brewery scene and experience in Colorado and Arizona. Jim had the beer experience down! Notwithstanding, the company faced its own set of problems. Like sourcing ingredients and fine-tuning their brewing process to ramp up production. Still, refusing to compromise on quality, the hard times were pushed through, culminating in the brewery‚Äôs expansion. Expansion and Growth As the word got out about the great beers at Little Miami Brewing Company, demand increased their need to expand. Key milestones marking the growth of the brewery included new steps along the way. The first large expansion deal was that of the new varieties of beers. Understanding the taste buds of their customers, Little Miami experimented with different ale styles and flavour profiles. Among others, the more famous beers created were Grateful IPA with bold and hoppy flavours and Magpie Amber Ale with rich malty flavour. To know more about the types of beers offered Click Here This was a direct investment in the brewing facility itself to increase output. Putting in new tanks and brewing equipment meant bigger batches and more consistent production. This growth enabled the brewery to maintain the high standards that had become its hallmark. Well, this expansion was not just to effect an increase in production; it also entailed enhancing the overall customer experience. The inside area of their taproom had been expanded to include a rooftop bar and¬† to provide a larger space with the normal rustic decor that bespoke warmth and classically reflected its heritage. Community Involvement Since its start, Little Miami Brewing Company has demonstrated serious commitment to the local community. Since the¬† inception there has been a realization that the goodwill and support of their neighbours will be pivotal.LMBC has donated to over 400 orgainzations since it opened in it‚Äôs Give Back Wednesdays. And so the brewery regularly sponsors local events and collaborates with other local businesses to foster community. This gets the brewery‚Äôs beers in front of people at events while tying the business into local culture. On top of this, Little Miami Brewing Company keeps itself involved in local initiatives, supporting environmental and educational causes. Such involvement by the brewery resonates with making a positive difference beyond brewing great beer. Brewing Innovations Innovation has been a part of Little Miami Brewing Company‚Äôs brewing philosophy since its very establishment. The founders seek out new technology and rare techniques for brewing to keep them one step ahead in the competitive craft beer market. Little Miami Brewing Company is proud of its unique recipes, most of them inspired by traditional brewing techniques but with a modern twist. For example, its Junkyard Dog includes the perfect mix of local ingredients with some exotic hops to achieve that fun taste hundreds of people love. It‚Äôs their brewing history that influences their innovations, placed inside so many of their beers. Classic styles are often paid homage to while looking to push the boundaries of what can be done in craft brewing. This blend of tradition with innovation marks Little Miami Brewing Company‚Äôs style. Signature Beers and Their Stories A signature series of beers, all telling and unique, have been crafted by Little Miami Brewing Co. These beers represent more than just a product; rather, they tell of creativity and the commitment to quality at the brewery. Probably one of the most popular beers is its Grateful, an IPA with a strikingly bronze color and powerful flavour. The story behind this beer is just as interesting as the beer itself. It was developed during a brainstorming session when the brewers wanted to create something which would be both striking in appearance and taste. The result of what happened there became a customer favourite very fast. A fruity IPA brewed with a famous San Francisco yeast strain and a massive amount of American hops (Cascade, Centennial, and and dry hopped with Mosaic) for a piney, citrusy hit of goodness. Another signature beer is their Curveball Beer, which is an Summer Wheat beer but with a bit of a twist. The Curveball Beer was actually a beer in development that really pushed the envelope on ingredients used and brewing techniques in order to create something people would not expect at all. It‚Äôs called Curveball because it was brewed during COVID which threw us all kinds of curveballs! Classic Belgian Wit brewed with orange peel and coriander. It‚Äôs light, refreshing and the perfect beer to sip on while watching baseball! These signature beers are not just seasonal; they are tantamount to staples in their lineup, with each finding a following. Their stories of creation enhance their appeal, making them not only beverages but pieces of the brewery‚Äôs history itself. Know More Awards and Recognition Over the years, Little Miami Brewing Company has collected awards and accolades that clearly define the organisation as a craft brewery leader. These recognitions showcase the commitments of excellence and innovation in what the brewery believes in. Our prominent awards include the Best Local Taproom , in Music and Nightlife for Best of Cincinnati. These recognitions do a lot more than simply adding to the prestige: they serve to increase the profile of the brewery and attract new customers, therefore opportunities for other breweries and business collaborations. The awards also validate the hard work and dedication of the brewery staff. This is further supported by testimonials and reviews from industry experts and elated customers. The simple meaning that clearly comes out is that the brewery is committed to making exceptional beers and ensuring customer experience is second to none. The Tap Room Experience A visit to Little Miami Brewing Company‚Äôs taproom means much more than that‚Äîit represents an experience. Located at 208 Mill St, Milford, OH, this taproom creates a warm atmosphere in which one can feel comfortable relaxing and enjoying their hospitality. The taproom also bears the heritage of a brewery with rustic elements and local artwork combined into a warm atmosphere. It‚Äôs an environment in which anyone would feel at ease‚Äînew and seasoned visitors alike. It enhances this experience with signature events such as live music nights and beer tasting sessions hosted at its taproom. At Little Miami Brewing Company, there is always something happening. Other than offering entertainment, such events provide customers with the opportunity to engage themselves with the brewery‚Äôs team and know more about their beers. Customer experiences and reviews speak loads about the taproom‚Äôs appeal. Many of its visitors praise the friendly staff, quality beers, and general ambiance. It‚Äôs these kinds of positive experiences that have built up Little Miami Brewing Company as a favorite destination for beer enthusiasts. Future Plans Little Miami Brewing Company is looking to the future, moving forward with several projects and plans for expansion to continue to grow its reach. Such plans include releasing new beers that boast unique flavour profiles, background stories, etc. In-house brewery staff at Little Miami Brewing Company work tirelessly to experiment with new ingredients and brewing techniques in pursuit of new beers to offer. The vision for the next decade is ambitious, yet rooted in core values: the founders remain committed to quality and community as they discover new opportunities for growth by extending the distribution network to enter new markets, locally and nationally. Conclusion Thus, what began as a passion, innovation, and community spirit is now the story of Little Miami Brewing Company (to visit Click Here ). Never losing sight of its vision‚Äîto make incredibly great craft beers and bring people together‚Äîfrom its humble beginning to becoming one of the favourite local institutions, this brewery has stayed focused. Visiting the brewery means becoming part of an ongoing story. Whether you‚Äôre a long-time patron or a newcomer, Little Miami Brewing Company was crafted to provide a unique and memorable experience. Learn more about the brewery, explore their beers, and plan a visit to the Event Center and Tap Room here: https://www.littlemiamibrewing.com/events Additional Resources To explore more about The Little Miami Brewing Company‚Äôs Click Here Information on brewery tours and how to book them: TOURS AVAILABLE MONDAY ‚Äì FRIDAY FROM 11AM-5PM Decor: Industrial Brick, Wood, Metal Brewery Theme. Experience breathtaking views at the Event Center, located along the picturesque Little Miami River, complete with river views from the patio! Offered in two room sizes to suit various party sizes, making it perfect for weddings, corporate events, rehearsal dinners, celebrations of life, and more. The small room accommodates 25-75 people, the large room fits 75-225 people. For larger events, both rooms can be rented together for a total seating capacity of 50-300 people. The rooms are separated by interior glass garage doors that can be opened or closed based on your space requirements. Is One of the Best Breweries in South Florida Miami Brewing Co. has established itself as one of the best breweries in South Florida , offering a unique craft beer experience that blends local flavors, community spirit, and an unbeatable atmosphere. Whether you‚Äôre a local beer enthusiast or a visitor exploring the top breweries in Florida , Miami Brewing Co. should be at the top of your list. Here‚Äôs why. The Unique Miami Brewing Co. Experience A Brewery with a True Miami Vibe Unlike other craft breweries in Miami , Miami Brewing Co. embodies the true essence of the city‚Äîvibrant, diverse, and full of energy. With a mix of tropical influences and a laid-back atmosphere, the brewery provides an immersive experience that reflects Miami‚Äôs lively culture. From the moment you step in, you‚Äôll feel the welcoming vibe that sets this place apart. More Than Just a Taproom ‚Äì A Community Gathering Spot Miami Brewing Co. isn‚Äôt just about beer; it‚Äôs about building a community . The brewery regularly hosts gatherings, from casual hangouts to exciting themed nights, making it the perfect spot to meet new people, celebrate special occasions, or just unwind after a long day. See our upcoming events Country Night, Live Events & More One of the biggest highlights of Miami Brewing Co. is its legendary Country Night . Held multiple times a week, these nights bring people together for line dancing, live music, and, of course, ice-cold craft beer . Beyond Country Night, the brewery hosts a variety of events, including beer tastings, live DJ sets, and game nights, ensuring there‚Äôs always something happening. Check out our event calendar Award-Winning Craft Beers & Local Ingredients The Power of Local Ingredients in Craft Beer Miami Brewing Co. takes pride in using locally sourced ingredients to craft its beers, enhancing each brew with unique flavors that reflect the essence of South Florida. From tropical fruits to hand-selected hops, every ingredient contributes to the distinct taste of their beers. Learn why local ingredients matter in craft beer Our Signature Beers ‚Äì A Taste of Miami The brewery‚Äôs menu boasts an impressive selection of craft beers, each with a unique Miami twist. Whether you prefer a refreshing blonde ale , a bold IPA , or a smooth, rich stout , there‚Äôs something for everyone. Some must-try beers include: Miami Vice IPA ‚Äì A crisp, citrusy IPA perfect for hot Miami days. Gator Tail Brown Ale ‚Äì A smooth, malty brew with caramel undertones. Shark Bait Wheat Ale ‚Äì Infused with tropical fruit flavors for a refreshing finish. Explore our full beer menu How Small-Batch Brewing Ensures Quality Unlike mass-produced beers, Miami Brewing Co. follows a small-batch brewing process , allowing for greater attention to detail and higher quality. This commitment to craftsmanship ensures that each beer maintains a consistent, delicious taste that keeps customers coming back for more. A Taproom Like No Other The Perfect Blend of Indoor & Outdoor Spaces The Miami Brewing Co. taproom offers the best of both worlds ‚Äîa cozy indoor space with a vibrant atmosphere and a spacious outdoor beer garden perfect for enjoying a drink under the Florida sun. Whether you‚Äôre in the mood for an intimate beer-tasting session or a lively night out, the taproom provides the ideal setting. Games, Live Music & A Unique Brewery Experience Beyond great beer, Miami Brewing Co. offers a one-of-a-kind brewery experience with live music, pool tables, arcade games, and even cornhole tournaments . There‚Äôs never a dull moment at this lively brewery. See what‚Äôs happening at our taproom Why Locals & Tourists Love Miami Brewing Co. Customer Reviews & Top-Rated Beers Customers consistently rave about Miami Brewing Co.‚Äôs delicious beers, fun atmosphere, and friendly staff . With top ratings on platforms like Google Reviews and Untappd , it‚Äôs clear that this brewery is a fan favorite. Read our customer reviews A Hidden Gem in South Florida‚Äôs Craft Beer Scene Miami Brewing Co. is often regarded as a hidden gem in South Florida , offering a unique alternative to the bustling bars of downtown Miami. It‚Äôs the perfect escape for craft beer lovers looking for a laid-back, authentic experience. Weekdays for a relaxed tasting experience with fewer crowds . Country Night for the ultimate brewery party atmosphere . Whether it‚Äôs special beer releases, seasonal festivals, or exclusive tasting nights , you won‚Äôt want to miss out! As a standout feature of the Cincinnati brewery landscape, we invite you to delve into what makes our brewery a must-visit destination. The Heart of Little Miami Brewing Company Founded with a passion for quality and a dedication to craft, Little Miami Brewing Company has quickly become a beloved part of the Cincinnati beer community. Our approach combines traditional brewing techniques with innovative twists to create unique, flavorful beers. Here at Little Miami, every sip tells a story of dedication and craft. What Makes Little Miami Brewing Stand Out? Little Miami Brewing isn‚Äôt just another brewery; it‚Äôs a pivotal part of Cincinnati‚Äôs vibrant brewery scene. Our brewery stands out for its variety of beers that cater to all palates, from the casual drinker to the seasoned connoisseur. Our commitment to quality is evident in each batch we brew, making us a strong contender for the title of one of the best breweries in Cincinnati. Our Beers and Menu Our diverse selection ranges from smooth, easy-drinking lagers to bold, innovative IPAs. Noteworthy is our Bike Path Pilsner, which captures the essence of the Little Miami River with its crisp and refreshing finish. Alongside our beers, the Little Miami Brewing Company menu offers a perfect pairing of hearty, delicious meals prepared to complement our craft brews, ensuring a satisfying visit every time. Experience Little Miami Brewing Company The Little Miami taproom embodies the spirit of Old Milford with its rustic charm and welcoming atmosphere. It‚Äôs a place where locals and tourists alike can gather to enjoy not just a drink, but a variety of events from live music nights to community-focused celebrations. Our brewery is not just about beer; it‚Äôs about creating experiences that bring people together. Explore our Tap Room and Event Center for more information. Community and Environmental Commitment At Little Miami Brewing Company, we believe in giving back to the community and protecting our natural surroundings. Our efforts extend beyond the brewery, participating in local initiatives and promoting sustainability practices that make a positive impact. This commitment not only enhances our local environment but also enriches the community spirit that envelops Cincinnati. Explore and Connect We warmly invite you to visit Little Miami Brewing Company to witness firsthand the craft and care that go into every batch of beer. Explore our offerings, experience our unique taproom events, and connect with us online to stay updated on what‚Äôs brewing. For a closer look, check out the Little Miami Brewing Company photos on our website and follow us on social media for the latest news and events. Conclusion Little Miami Brewing Company is more than just a brewery; it‚Äôs a cornerstone of the Cincinnati beer scene, offering a blend of tradition and innovation. Whether you‚Äôre a local or just passing through, we guarantee that a visit to our brewery will be a highlight of your Cincinnati experience. Art, in imagining what beer can be. Whether it‚Äôs excellent versions of classic styles, or boundary pushing experimental brews, Bainbridge Brewing blends the art and science of beer. Craft beer is also a social beverage and the Taproom and Alehouse are part of our culture here in the Northwest. The local brewery is part of the fabric of the community, giving it character, individuality, and indeed, an air of hometown pride. Bainbridge Brewing is the island‚Äôs brewery, and the island is as much a part of us as we are of it. Opened in 2012, the Bainbridge Island Brewing Company operates the Brewery & Taproom at Coppertop Park, and the Bainbridge Brewing Alehouse in Downtown Winslow. The Company is co-owned by Chuck and Russell Everett and Rob Frease. Brewmaster Russell Everett, Brewmaster/Co-Owner, was raised on the island and is a graduate of Bainbridge High, the University of Washington, and the University of Miami. Like many brewers, he started as a avid homebrewer and went pro. Russell says a great beer is about so many things. But suffice it to say, he likes a beer that‚Äôs done well: free of faults, well balanced, served right, and just what you‚Äôre looking for. And while his brewing philosophy is to always make it well, he‚Äôs not afraid to experiment. Case in point ‚Äì the brewery‚Äôs Sandbox Series experimental beers. As an award-winning Brewmaster, he‚Äôs always enjoyed using new ingredients, trying out new brewing methods, and using new flavors. Russell is always perfecting the classic year round and seasonal beer styles that the brewery produces. At the same time, the brewery also makes some interesting one-off‚Äôs, barrel-aged beers, and sours. So keep an eye on what‚Äôs up next! About Us - Manhattan Brewing Company Skip to main content We use cookies to improve site performance and your experience. View our privacy policy for more information OK Go Home About Us Beers MBC Lounge MBC Catering The Brew Deck Join Our Team Shop Wing Wars Contact Us Our Story About Us We're ready to share our beers with Manhattan. With nearly 20 years of collective experience in the craft beer industry, we're focused on brewing and serving high-quality craft beers in a family-friendly atmosphere in the heart of downtown Manhattan. This town is our home, and we want to bring the best possible beer experience and education to the wonderful people of Manhattan. We want to create a place for everyone to come out and have a good time with friends and cultivate a craft beer culture Manhattan can be proud of. Our Team The best and brightest Co-Owners Portraits by Killian Millner Adam Krebsbach Brewer A native of Norton, Kansas, who moved to Manhattan in 2006, Adam's unrelenting creative energy has resulted in a tasty variety of imaginative beers. A tinkerer at heart, Adam is the yin to Garrett's yang; for every traditional style brewed by Garrett, you'll find Adam experimenting with an array of unique ingredients into his beers to challenge and delight beer fans. Adam loves drinking American pale ales, robust porters and Belgian tripels. Garrett Paulman Brewer A professionally trained brewer from the renowned Siebel Institute of Technology in Chicago, Garrett also brings experience in facility management and quality control. Garrett started brewing in 2011 before making the leap to attend Siebel and "turn pro" in 2012. You will find Garrett drinking anything hoppy while laughing with friends, family and strangers at the bar. Although he's a Nebraska native, Garrett, his wife and two children are K-State fans in training. Jake Voegeli Sales & Marketing A former K-State football player from Wichita, Kansas, who bleeds purple with his wife and daughter, Jake's journey into craft beer began in college after committing himself to trying a new six pack each week. Jake loves to challenge his palate with hoppy IPAs, sours and barrel-aged stouts, but also loves a well-crafted, delicate pilsner or a traditional English brown ale. An experienced salesman and marketer both in the craft beer and spirits industries, you'll mostly see Jake up front slinging beers or chatting with guests about beer, K-State football, his favorite Ryan Bingham album or his daughter Chloe.
